node.title: As new COVID-19 variant hits South Africa, some locals listen to preachers doing research 'from the internet'
node.alt: A woman in a face mask looks through a barred window
node.description: Experts say vaccination rates need to pick up to prevent the new variant spreading in South Africa, as some of its citizens take their lead from preachers relying on misinformation from the internet.
node.content:
["Few countries have felt COVID-19 more forcefully than South Africa.\u00a0", "It has overcome three outbreaks of the disease, lost nearly 90,000 lives\u00a0and endured crippling lockdowns that have brought parts of the economy to its knees.", "On top of that, it has almost seen its health system collapse.\u00a0", "Now, South Africans have been told one of the most radically mutated\u00a0versions of the virus could be the cause of a recent spike in cases near the nation's capital.\u00a0", "In an impromptu address to the country about the variant, Health Minister Joe Phaahla expressed frustration that so few South Africans had\u00a0turned up to be vaccinated.", "The country\u00a0has a target of vaccinating 70 per cent of its adult population, but has only reached 40 per cent.", "\u201cWe know that, if more and more people are vaccinated, we can limit the number of mutations,\u201d he said.", "On November 16,\u00a0only 273 new cases were reported.\u00a0Just\u00a0a week later it had reached 1,275 then doubled to 2,465 the following day.\u00a0", "Dr Phaahla said that was\u00a0when scientists told the government of their concern that a new variant was driving the spike in cases.\u00a0", "Bioinformatician Professor\u00a0Tulio de Oliveira explained the variant had an \"unusual constellation of mutations\" that could make it more easily transmissible and better at evading the immune system. \u00a0", "\"It is a reason for concern in South Africa,\" he said.\u00a0", "At the briefing, the Health Minister urged people to sanitise their hands, wear masks in public, avoid potential spreader events such as end-of-year parties, and get vaccinated.\u00a0", "Professor Wiysonge said there was one clear problem holding back vaccine rates: vaccine hesitancy. \u00a0", "
The vaccine debate
", "The ABC spoke to Cape Town-based\u00a0Uber driver Misheck Mabheka earlier this month, before the latest variant was detected.\u00a0\u00a0", "", "
Misheck Mabheka hopes he can convince\u00a0unvaccinated people to get the jab by showing them it has not hurt him.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "He said the\u00a0vaccine was \"working nice\" for\u00a0him, and that he told this\u00a0to anyone who asked\u00a0about the benefits of being vaccinated.", "\"I'm working every day with lots of different people.\u00a0I'm not sick and I'm not even affected,\" said the Zimbabwean who now works in Cape Town.\u00a0", "Like many South Africans, Mr Mabheka said he was\u00a0troubled by the number of people resisting vaccination, despite the noticeable effect it has had on reducing transmission rates.\u00a0", "Earlier in the year, South Africa's vaccine programme stalled because supply was constrained.\u00a0", "", "
Health authorities have had more success convincing older age groups to get vaccinated than younger people.(Getty Images: Beeld/Gallo Images/Felix Dlangamandla)
", "Now the country has plenty of doses and not enough people showing up to be vaccinated.\u00a0", "At its peak in August, South Africa administered nearly 400,000 vaccine doses in one day. Over the past week, the daily rate has at times dropped below 10,000 doses.\u00a0", "To get people across the line, vaccines were offered at 1,000 polling stations during recent municipal elections, people over 50 were offered supermarket vouchers when they had\u00a0their first dose, and vaccination drives have been held on weekends in shopping centres and town halls.\u00a0", "Professor Wiysonge said getting the vaccination rate up would\u00a0be hard, but not\u00a0impossible.\u00a0", "\"It is going to be a high mountain to climb, but we can climb it,\" he said.\u00a0", "
'In\u00a0the hands of God'
", "On a dusty field, under a worn marquee in Ashton, about 200km from Cape Town, church-goers seemed unaware of the rising heat and the global pandemic at a recent Sunday service.\u00a0", "", "
Worshippers sing and dance at a church service in a small farming town in the Western Cape, South Africa.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "There was not a mask in sight, even though the spirited singing and dancing made\u00a0this a high-risk event.\u00a0", "Elder Jonas de Koker tells his followers Jesus will help them overcome financial despair, family crisis or sickness.\u00a0", "Mr De Koker\u00a0told the ABC he did not discourage others from being vaccinated, but he has chosen not to be inoculated against COVID-19.\u00a0", "\"It's your own democratic right to choose [but]\u00a0I just say that life and death is in the hands of God,\" he said.\u00a0", "Mr De Koker said he believed God had saved his life before and would continue to protect him.", "", "
Pastor Jonas de Koker leads rousing church services attended by dozens of people, but has not been vaccinated.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "\"It's not that I'm against [the vaccine]\u00a0but, for myself I said no, I'm fine,\" he said.\u00a0", "Stephen Smith preaches at a similar evangelical ministry, but takes a harder line on COVID-19.\u00a0", "He tells the factory workers and farm labourers at his services the pandemic was planned by powerful people.\u00a0", "\"Some of them see this as an opportunity to get richer,\" he told the ABC. \u00a0", "Not only has he actively discouraged people from being vaccinated, he has also discouraged several people with COVID-19 symptoms from being tested.\u00a0", "", "
Stephen Smith takes his Revival Tent Ministry to rural communities throughout the Western Cape.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "Mr Smith \u2014\u00a0who describes medicine as \"common sense\" \u2014\u00a0said he was unlikely to change his views. \u00a0", "When followers reach out to him when they\u00a0think they've caught COVID-19, he prefers to offer prayer\u00a0and a mixture of ginger, lemon juice, garlic and aspirin.\u00a0", "He said his views \u2014 which were based on research he did \"on the internet\" \u2014\u00a0were\u00a0also\u00a0influenced by a distrust of the government.\u00a0\u00a0\u00a0\u00a0", "", "
\u00a0A worshipper dances during a evangelical service held in a tent in Ashton, 200 km from Cape Town.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "According to Professor Wiysonge,\u00a0vaccine uptake is high in the parts of South Africa where its citizens\u00a0felt\u00a0the government dealt with the pandemic effectively.\u00a0", "Meanwhile,\u00a0in areas where people distrusted the government, vaccinates rates are\u00a0low.\u00a0", "Corruption within the ruling African National Congress\u00a0is also an issue.\u00a0", "President Cyril Ramaphosa has acknowledged corruption was rife under former President Jacob Zuma, but has struggled to clean up his own government.", "", "
Corruption has plagued South African President Cyril Ramaphosa's government and dented confidence in its response to COVID-19(Reuters: Jerome Delay )
", "A recent report by South Africa's anti-corruption unit revealed millions of dollars intended for the fight against COVID-19 were misappropriated, some of it by the former health minister Dr\u00a0Zweli Mkhize.\u00a0", "As he drives around the suburbs of Cape Town, Mr Mabheka said some\u00a0passengers told\u00a0him they didn't want to be vaccinated because they thought\u00a0the vaccination drive was a ploy to line the pockets of corrupt officials. \u00a0", "", "
Uber driver Misheck \u00a0Mabheka tells people who distrust authorities that getting vaccinated is about their health, not about the government.(ABC News: Mary Lloyd)
", "The Uber driver doesn't want to see unvaccinated people shunned, shut out of work, or unable to attend events such as\u00a0sport matches because\u00a0he worries this will drive more division.\u00a0", "\"Try to understand their side\u00a0but, in the same sense, give them that side of yours,\" he said. \u00a0", "Professor Wiysonge also argues that the door should not be closed on people who resist being vaccinated.\u00a0", "\"Engage them, listen attentively to what the issues are, what their concerns are, show empathy,\" he said.\u00a0", "\"It's good to bring the evidence, but it's also important to just show that you care.\"\u00a0"]
